item.description:
Hey everyone! I'm scheduling a reoccurring event on Mondays at Rock Spot Climbing's Lincoln, RI location (formerly RI Rock Gym). I set it at 6:30pm, but of course since the gym is open until midnight if you come a little later you'll probably still find someone to climb with. Lately, most of us have been arriving around 7/7:30. Please post the time you expect to arrive so we don't miss each other.

Now that I can climb again I will try to make it every week, but please also use the mailing list to get in touch with other members if you need a carpool or want to make sure you'll have a belay partner. If you don't know how to belay yet, please call RSC Lincoln 401-727-1704 and let them know you're coming and will need a lesson. It'll take about 45 minutes. If you've never climbed at RSC but already know how to belay, you'll need to take a quick belay test, no need to call ahead for that. Special Meetup Prices: Mention that you're there for the Meetup and you'll pay $15 if you need gear and/or a lesson, and just $10 if you have your own gear! It's also hospitality night so if you're bringing a friend who's not in the meetup group but they work at a restaurant or hotel tell them to bring proof of employment and they'll get the same discount prices as you. What a deal! Climb on! ~Kat

www.rockspotclimbing.com for more info on the gym.
item.how_to_find_us: Mention Meetup at the front desk
item.name: Monday Nights at Rock Spot Lincoln
